title: 90: Episode #90: Zap The Fat Away
itunes:title: Episode #90: Zap The Fat Away
description:
• Jo finally makes some site updates.
  • We read some listener rebuttals that clear up some past uncertainties.
  • Main Discussion: THE SYMBOL.
  • Now the centerpiece of Bloomsbury’s website.
  • Bloomsbury says it does play a significant role.
  • We take listeners’ theories on the symbol.
  • Is it related to the Key of Solomon?
  • Is it an ancient rune that symbolizes the Order of the Phoenix?
  • Since it’s on white marble, is it possibly found on Dumbledore’s tomb?
  • Does it mean “broken trinity” or “loss of faith”?
  • Voicemails return.
  • Chicken Soup.
  • Part 1 of a series of interviews with the creators of the OOTP video game.
itunes:author: Harry Potter
dc:creator: Harry Potter
